mapper.select:
SELECT ProcessID AS "ProcessID" , InitiatorID AS "InitiatorID" , InitiatorName AS "InitiatorName" , InitiatorUnitID AS "InitiatorUnitID" , InitiatorUnitName AS "InitiatorUnitName" , StartDate AS "StartDate" , EndDate AS "EndDate" , DeleteDate AS "DeleteDate" , ProcessState AS "ProcessState" , InitiatorSIPAddress AS "InitiatorSIPAddress" , DocSubject AS "DocSubject" , Subject AS "Subject" , BizDocFormID AS "BizDocFormID" , BizDocID AS "BizDocID" , SubKind AS "SubKind" , ProcessDescriptionID AS "ProcessDescriptionID" , FormInstID AS "FormInstID" , FormID AS "FormID" , FormPrefix AS "FormPrefix" , FormName AS "FormName" , FormSubject AS "FormSubject" , IsSecureDoc AS "IsSecureDoc" , IsFile AS "IsFile" , FileExt AS "FileExt" , IsComment AS "IsComment" , ApproverCode AS "ApproverCode" , ApproverName AS "ApproverName" , ApprovalStep AS "ApprovalStep" , ApproverSIPAddress AS "ApproverSIPAddress" , IsReserved AS "IsReserved" , ReservedGubun AS "ReservedGubun" , ReservedTime AS "ReservedTime" , Priority AS "Priority" , IsModify AS "IsModify" , Reserved1 AS "Reserved1" , Reserved2 AS "Reserved2" , BusinessData1 AS "BusinessData1" , BusinessData2 AS "BusinessData2" , BusinessData3 AS "BusinessData3" , BusinessData4 AS "BusinessData4" , BusinessData5 AS "BusinessData5" , BusinessData6 AS "BusinessData6" , BusinessData7 AS "BusinessData7" , BusinessData8 AS "BusinessData8" , BusinessData9 AS "BusinessData9" , BusinessData10 AS "BusinessData10" FROM ( SELECT A.ProcessID ,A.InitiatorID ,A.InitiatorName ,A.InitiatorUnitID ,A.InitiatorUnitName , A.startDate AS startDate , A.endDate AS endDate , A.DeleteDate AS DeleteDate ,A.ProcessState ,A.InitiatorSIPAddress ,A.DocSubject ,B.Subject ,D.BizDocFormID ,E.BizDocID ,'T006' as SubKind ,C.* FROM JWF_PROCESS A INNER JOIN JWF_FORMINSTANCE B ON B.FormInstID = A.FormInstID INNER JOIN JWF_PROCESSDESCRIPTION C ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = C.ProcessDescriptionID INNER JOIN JWF_BIZDOCFORM D ON D.FormPrefix = C.FormPrefix INNER JOIN JWF_BIZDOC E ON D.BizDocID = E.BizDocID WHERE A.ProcessState = 288 AND E.BizDocCode = #{bizDocCode} AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL AND A.ParentProcessID = 0
AND B.EntCode = #{entCode}
AND B.EntCode IN ('ORGROOT', #{entCode})
) BizDocProcessList
startDate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') + 1
AND
FormSubject InitiatorUnitName InitiatorName FormName FormSubject
LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND startDate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{searchGroupWord}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{searchGroupWord}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') + 1
AND
InitiatorID InitiatorUnitID FormPrefix
= #{searchGroupWord}
, Priority DESC
, startDate Desc
,
FormSubject InitiatorName InitiatorUnitName IsFile FormName DocNo StartDate StartDate
ASC DESC

SELECT
BizDocProcessList."Date" AS "fieldID" , COUNT(BizDocProcessList."Date") AS "fieldCnt" , BizDocProcessList."Date" as "fieldName"
BizDocProcessList.FormPrefix AS "fieldID" , COUNT(BizDocProcessList.FormPrefix) AS "fieldCnt" , BizDocProcessList.FormName as "fieldName"
BizDocProcessList.InitiatorID AS "fieldID" , COUNT(BizDocProcessList.InitiatorID) AS "fieldCnt" , BizDocProcessList.InitiatorName as "fieldName"
BizDocProcessList.InitiatorUnitID AS "fieldID" , COUNT(BizDocProcessList.InitiatorUnitID) AS "fieldCnt" , BizDocProcessList.InitiatorUnitName as "fieldName"
FROM ( SELECT A.ProcessID ,A.InitiatorID ,A.InitiatorName ,A.InitiatorUnitID ,A.InitiatorUnitName
,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(Fn_ComURTimeZoneTrans_S(#{userID}, A.startDate),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date"
,TO_CHAR(A.startDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date"
, A.endDate AS endDate , A.DeleteDate AS DeleteDate ,A.ProcessState ,A.InitiatorSIPAddress ,A.DocSubject ,B.Subject ,D.BizDocFormID ,E.BizDocID ,'T006' as SubKind ,C.* FROM JWF_PROCESS A INNER JOIN JWF_FORMINSTANCE B ON B.FormInstID = A.FormInstID INNER JOIN JWF_PROCESSDESCRIPTION C ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = C.ProcessDescriptionID INNER JOIN JWF_BIZDOCFORM D ON D.FormPrefix = C.FormPrefix INNER JOIN JWF_BIZDOC E ON D.BizDocID = E.BizDocID WHERE A.ProcessState = 288 AND E.BizDocCode = #{bizDocCode} AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL AND A.ParentProcessID = 0
AND B.EntCode = #{entCode}
AND B.EntCode IN ('ORGROOT', #{entCode})
) BizDocProcessList
"Date" BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND
FormSubject InitiatorUnitName InitiatorName FormName FormSubject
LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
BizDocProcessList."Date"
BizDocProcessList.InitiatorID BizDocProcessList.InitiatorUnitID BizDocProcessList.FormPrefix
,BizDocProcessList.FormName
, BizDocProcessList.InitiatorName
, BizDocProcessList.InitiatorUnitName
"fieldName" ASC

SELECT ProcessID AS "ProcessID" , InitiatorID AS "InitiatorID" , InitiatorName AS "InitiatorName" , InitiatorUnitID AS "InitiatorUnitID" , InitiatorUnitName AS "InitiatorUnitName" , StartDate AS "StartDate" , EndDate AS "EndDate" , DeleteDate AS "DeleteDate" , ProcessState AS "ProcessState" , InitiatorSIPAddress AS "InitiatorSIPAddress" , DocSubject AS "DocSubject" , Subject AS "Subject" , SubKind AS "SubKind" , BizDocFormID AS "BizDocFormID" , BizDocID AS "BizDocID" , ProcessDescriptionID AS "ProcessDescriptionArchiveID" , FormInstID AS "FormInstID" , FormID AS "FormID" , FormName AS "FormName" , FormSubject AS "FormSubject" , IsSecureDoc AS "IsSecureDoc" , IsFile AS "IsFile" , FileExt AS "FileExt" , IsComment AS "IsComment" , DocNo AS "DocNo" , ApproverCode AS "ApproverCode" , ApproverName AS "ApproverName" , ApprovalStep AS "ApprovalStep" , ApproverSIPAddress AS "ApproverSIPAddress" , IsReserved AS "IsReserved" , ReservedGubun AS "ReservedGubun" , ReservedTime AS "ReservedTime" , Priority AS "Priority" , IsModify AS "IsModify" , Reserved1 AS "Reserved1" , Reserved2 AS "Reserved2" , BusinessData1 AS "BusinessData1" , BusinessData2 AS "BusinessData2" , BusinessData3 AS "BusinessData3" , BusinessData4 AS "BusinessData4" , BusinessData5 AS "BusinessData5" , BusinessData6 AS "BusinessData6" , BusinessData7 AS "BusinessData7" , BusinessData8 AS "BusinessData8" , BusinessData9 AS "BusinessData9" , BusinessData10 AS "BusinessData10" FROM ( SELECT A.ProcessID ,A.InitiatorID ,A.InitiatorName ,A.InitiatorUnitID ,A.InitiatorUnitName , A.startDate AS startDate , A.endDate AS endDate , A.DeleteDate AS DeleteDate ,A.ProcessState ,A.InitiatorSIPAddress ,A.DocSubject ,B.Subject ,'T006' as SubKind ,C.BizDocFormID ,D.BizDocID ,E.* ,E.ProcessDescriptionID as ProcessDescriptionArchiveID FROM JWF_PROCESS A INNER JOIN JWF_FORMINSTANCE B ON B.FormInstID = A.FormInstID INNER JOIN JWF_BIZDOCFORM C ON C.FormPrefix = A.FormPrefix INNER JOIN JWF_BIZDOC D ON D.BizDocID = C.BizDocID INNER JOIN JWF_PROCESSDESCRIPTION E ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = E.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE A.DeleteDate IS NULL AND D.BizDocCode = #{bizDocCode} AND A.BusinessState like '02_01%' AND A.ParentProcessID = 0 AND A.ProcessState = 528
AND B.EntCode = #{entCode}
AND B.EntCode IN ('ORGROOT', #{entCode})
) BizDocCompleteList
endDate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') + 1
AND
FormSubject InitiatorUnitName InitiatorName FormName FormSubject
LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND endDate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{searchGroupWord}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{searchGroupWord}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') + 1
AND
InitiatorID InitiatorUnitID FormPrefix
= #{searchGroupWord}
, endDate Desc
,
FormSubject InitiatorName InitiatorUnitName IsFile FormName DocNo EndDate EndDate
ASC DESC

SELECT
BizDocCompleteList."Date" AS "fieldID" , COUNT(BizDocCompleteList."Date") AS "fieldCnt" , BizDocCompleteList."Date" as "fieldName"
BizDocCompleteList.FormPrefix AS "fieldID" , COUNT(BizDocCompleteList.FormPrefix) AS "fieldCnt" , BizDocCompleteList.FormName as "fieldName"
BizDocCompleteList.InitiatorID AS "fieldID" , COUNT(BizDocCompleteList.InitiatorID) AS "fieldCnt" , BizDocCompleteList.InitiatorName as "fieldName"
BizDocCompleteList.InitiatorUnitID AS "fieldID" , COUNT(BizDocCompleteList.InitiatorUnitID) AS "fieldCnt" , BizDocCompleteList.InitiatorUnitName as "fieldName"
FROM ( SELECT A.ProcessID ,A.InitiatorID ,A.InitiatorName ,A.InitiatorUnitID ,A.InitiatorUnitName
,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(Fn_ComURTimeZoneTrans_S(#{userID}, A.endDate),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date"
,TO_CHAR(A.endDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Date"
, A.endDate AS endDate , A.DeleteDate AS DeleteDate ,A.ProcessState ,A.InitiatorSIPAddress ,A.DocSubject ,B.Subject ,'T006' as SubKind ,C.BizDocFormID ,D.BizDocID ,E.* FROM JWF_PROCESS A INNER JOIN JWF_FORMINSTANCE B ON B.FormInstID = A.FormInstID INNER JOIN JWF_BIZDOCFORM C ON C.FormPrefix = A.FormPrefix INNER JOIN JWF_BIZDOC D ON D.BizDocID = C.BizDocID INNER JOIN JWF_PROCESSDESCRIPTION E ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = E.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE A.DeleteDate IS NULL AND D.BizDocCode = #{bizDocCode} AND A.BusinessState like '02_01%' AND A.ParentProcessID = 0 AND A.ProcessState = 528
AND B.EntCode = #{entCode}
AND B.EntCode IN ('ORGROOT', #{entCode})
) BizDocCompleteList
"Date" BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND
FormSubject InitiatorUnitName InitiatorName FormName FormSubject
LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
BizDocCompleteList."Date"
BizDocCompleteList.InitiatorID BizDocCompleteList.InitiatorUnitID BizDocCompleteList.FormPrefix
,BizDocCompleteList.FormName
, BizDocCompleteList.InitiatorName
, BizDocCompleteList.InitiatorUnitName
"fieldName" ASC

SELECT ProcessID AS "ProcessID" ,SubKind AS "SubKind" ,ApprovalStep AS "ApprovalStep" ,FormSubject AS "FormSubject" ,InitiatorID AS "InitiatorID" ,InitiatorName AS "InitiatorName" ,InitiatorUnitID AS "InitiatorUnitID" ,InitiatorUnitName AS "InitiatorUnitName" ,TO_CHAR(StartDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "StartDate" ,TO_CHAR(EndDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "EndDate" ,DeleteDate AS "DeleteDate" ,IsFile AS "IsFile" ,FormName AS "FormName" ,IsComment AS "IsComment" ,IsModify AS "IsModify" ,FormID AS "FormID" ,Priority AS "Priority" ,ProcessState AS "ProcessState" ,InitiatorSIPAddress AS "InitiatorSIPAddress" ,DocSubject AS "DocSubject" ,Subject AS "Subject" ,BizDocFormID AS "BizDocFormID" ,BizDocID AS "BizDocID" FROM ( SELECT A.ProcessID ,A.InitiatorID ,A.InitiatorName ,A.InitiatorUnitID ,A.InitiatorUnitName ,A.StartDate ,A.EndDate ,A.DeleteDate ,A.ProcessState ,A.InitiatorSIPAddress ,A.DocSubject ,B.Subject ,D.BizDocFormID ,E.BizDocID ,'T006' as SubKind ,C.* FROM JWF_PROCESS A INNER JOIN JWF_FORMINSTANCE B ON B.FormInstID = A.FormInstID INNER JOIN JWF_ProcessDescription C ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = C.ProcessDescriptionID INNER JOIN jwf_bizdocform D ON D.FormPrefix = C.FormPrefix INNER JOIN jwf_bizdoc E ON D.BizDocID = E.BizDocID WHERE A.ProcessState = 288 AND E.BizDocCode = #{bizDocCode} AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL AND A.ParentProcessID = 0
AND B.EntCode = #{entCode}
AND B.EntCode IN ('ORGROOT', #{entCode})
) BizDocProcessList
startDate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') + 1
AND
FormSubject InitiatorUnitName InitiatorName FormName FormSubject
LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND startDate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{searchGroupWord}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{searchGroupWord}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') + 1
AND
InitiatorID InitiatorUnitID FormPrefix
= #{searchGroupWord}
, Priority DESC
, startDate Desc
,
FormSubject InitiatorName InitiatorUnitName IsFile FormName DocNo StartDate StartDate
ASC DESC

SELECT ProcessID AS "ProcessID" , InitiatorID AS "InitiatorID" , InitiatorName AS "InitiatorName" , InitiatorUnitID AS "InitiatorUnitID" , InitiatorUnitName AS "InitiatorUnitName" , TO_CHAR(StartDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "StartDate" , TO_CHAR(EndDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "EndDate" , DeleteDate AS "DeleteDate" , ProcessState AS "ProcessState" , InitiatorSIPAddress AS "InitiatorSIPAddress" , DocSubject AS "DocSubject" , Subject AS "Subject" , SubKind AS "SubKind" , BizDocFormID AS "BizDocFormID" , BizDocID AS "BizDocID" , ProcessDescriptionID AS "ProcessDescriptionArchiveID" , FormInstID AS "FormInstID" , FormID AS "FormID" , FormName AS "FormName" , FormSubject AS "FormSubject" , IsSecureDoc AS "IsSecureDoc" , IsFile AS "IsFile" , FileExt AS "FileExt" , IsComment AS "IsComment" , DocNo AS "DocNo" , ApproverCode AS "ApproverCode" , ApproverName AS "ApproverName" , ApprovalStep AS "ApprovalStep" , ApproverSIPAddress AS "ApproverSIPAddress" , IsReserved AS "IsReserved" , ReservedGubun AS "ReservedGubun" , ReservedTime AS "ReservedTime" , Priority AS "Priority" , IsModify AS "IsModify" , Reserved1 AS "Reserved1" , Reserved2 AS "Reserved2" FROM ( SELECT A.ProcessID ,A.InitiatorID ,A.InitiatorName ,A.InitiatorUnitID ,A.InitiatorUnitName ,A.StartDate ,A.EndDate ,A.DeleteDate ,A.ProcessState ,A.InitiatorSIPAddress ,A.DocSubject ,B.Subject ,'T006' as SubKind ,C.BizDocFormID ,D.BizDocID ,E.* FROM JWF_PROCESS A INNER JOIN JWF_FORMINSTANCE B ON B.FormInstID = A.FormInstID INNER JOIN jwf_bizdocform C ON C.FormPrefix = A.FormPrefix INNER JOIN jwf_bizdoc D ON D.BizDocID = C.BizDocID INNER JOIN JWF_ProcessDescription E ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = E.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE A.DeleteDate IS NULL AND D.BizDocCode = #{bizDocCode} AND A.BusinessState like '02_01%' AND A.ParentProcessID = 0 AND A.ProcessState = 528
AND B.EntCode = #{entCode}
AND B.EntCode IN ('ORGROOT', #{entCode})
) BizDocCompleteList
endDate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') + 1
AND
FormSubject InitiatorUnitName InitiatorName FormName FormSubject
LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND endDate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{searchGroupWord}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{searchGroupWord}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') + 1
AND
InitiatorID InitiatorUnitID FormPrefix
= #{searchGroupWord}
, endDate Desc
,
FormSubject InitiatorName InitiatorUnitName IsFile FormName DocNo StartDate StartDate
ASC DESC
